name: Mirror Stage
notice_txt:
1. During the event, accumulate points in specific "Mirror Stage" maps and meet point targets to unlock corresponding rewards.
2. Each event reward can only be collected once.
3. You can score no more points once the "Mirror Stage" event has ended, but the event interface will remain until the deadline for collecting rewards.
4. Before the event interface expires, you can access the reward collection interface through the rotating banners in the bottom left corner on the home page. Once the interface expires, you will no longer be able to collect your rewards.

name: Poincare Recurrence
notice_txt:
1、活动期间，在“熵减焓增”指定积分模式关卡中，累计获取积分，完成积分目标即可领取对应奖励。
2、每个活动奖励仅可领取一次。
3、“熵减焓增”活动结束后将不能继续获取积分，活动界面则会保留至领奖截止时间。
4、活动界面关闭之前，可从主界面左下角的滚动活动图中进入本领奖界面，活动截止时间结束之后将无法获取奖励。

name: Hornet's Nest+
notice_txt:
1. During the event, accumulate points in specific "Hornet's Nest+" maps and meet point targets to unlock corresponding rewards.
2. Each event reward can only be collected once.
3. You can score no more points once the "Hornet's Nest+" event has ended, but the event interface will remain until the deadline for collecting rewards(Oct. 18th 23:59:59 UTC-8).
4. Before the event interface expires, you can access the reward collection interface through the rotating banners in the bottom left corner on the home page. Once the interface expires, you will no longer be able to collect your rewards.
